allow: Bash(python -c " import sys, json data = json.load\(sys.stdin\) for item in data.get\(''tree'', []\): path = item.get\(''path'', ''''\) if ''sidebar'' in path.lower\(\) and \(''sidebar-07'' in path or ''ui/sidebar'' in path\): print\(path\) ")
